text: Petr Pulkrábek (born 4 May 1939) is a Czech rower who represented Czechoslovakia. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's coxed four where they were eliminated in the semi-finals. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Czechoslovak male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Prague
title: Petr Pulkrábek
